trends: There have been 10 other sightings in North Royalton
There were 2 other sightings in North Royalton on or around August 24th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI have witnessed these same craft hovering above the Cleveland area 4 nights in a row now. Red and green light flashing with a very large white light craft in the center of the smaller craft. Moves ever so slowly over the area towards the southwest. Last nights viewing had 7 small craft with the large one. Still too early tonight to see just how many small craft will be here. No additional movements on their parts.
